Articles.Content:
I have always wanted a VTOL and I finaly made one. It's fast with four horizontal engines and two vertical engines. All that power can push it to 255 m/s at 2500 meters. Missles can be added with no stability loss,and really anything can be added up to about 15 tons. However 15 tons isn't much compaired to my Air-6 and other VTOLs. Cough cough Cupcake Cough cough.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Hope you enjoy flying it and please give me some feed back so I can improve it.

Action groups

1. VTOL Engines

2. Four Horizontal Engines

3. Outside 2 Horizontal engines

4. Middle Horizontal Engines

Download http://www./?ls9yfxqy2g0jh13

Thank you, I like this style too. She should handle pretty good(a little sluggish with all that weight) however for VTOL mode I couldn't balance the engines so SAS is recommended. That is also why there is four reaction wheels
